title: Is She Not Here Yet?
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>….I knew it, wouldn’t it be better if we tell Honoka that the meeting time is 10 minutes early from now on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm…. I still think that we shouldn’t lie, Umi-chan. Even if she doesn’t come on time, we can still call her to check on her, so it’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re too nice on Honoka, Kotori….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeh, am I the only one though? I know your secret, Umi-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Secret? I don’t have anything like that though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka always arrives in a rush whenever we meet up, right? Because she’s in a rush, she’s prone to fall and bump into things and get a bit hurt, right? I know that you always bring a disinfectant and a band-aid to take care of her injuries, Umi-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeh!? H-, how did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe…. You always patch her up quickly every time. So of course I know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….Keep this a secret from Honoka. Okay, Kotori?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. Let’s keep the fact that we both re~ally love Honoka-chan a secret♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
